column1: You will spend 6 months of your life waiting for red lights to turn green.
Your mouth produces one litre of saliva each day.
Your left lung is 10% smaller than your right lung.
Your heart can sync to the rhythm when you listen to music.
If you have 500rs in your pocket and no debts, you are wealthier than 25% of everyone.
There are at least 40 types of jobs you can get hired for today that will be replaced by AI soon.
You shed around 3000 skin cells each day.
You can survive in space for at least 15 seconds without a suit.
Every time you yawn, the blood flow in your brain increases.
